name: Newcomer Set
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

The new fighters get some new costumes! This set contains a total of 16 costumes for 5 characters. Content included: - DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Marie Rose - DOA5LR Newcomer Sports Costume - Marie Rose - DOA5LR Newcomer Casual Costume - Marie Rose - DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Phase 4 - DOA5LR Newcomer Police Costume - Phase 4 - DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Nyotengu - DOA5LR Newcomer Casual Costume - Nyotengu - DOA5LR Newcomer Bedtime Costume - Nyotengu - DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Honoka - DOA5LR Newcomer Police Costume - Honoka - DOA5LR Newcomer Bedtime Costume - Honoka - DOA5LR Newcomer Casual Costume - Honoka - DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Naotora Ii - DOA5LR Newcomer Police Costume - Naotora Ii - DOA5LR Newcomer Gym Class Costume - Naotora Ii - DOA5LR Newcomer Swimsuit Costume - Naotora Ii *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content. *You must purchase the character Naotora Ii separately before using content for her.
about_the_game:
The new fighters get some new costumes! This set contains a total of 16 costumes for 5 characters.

Content included:
- DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Marie Rose
- DOA5LR Newcomer Sports Costume - Marie Rose
- DOA5LR Newcomer Casual Costume - Marie Rose
- DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Phase 4
- DOA5LR Newcomer Police Costume - Phase 4
- DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Nyotengu
- DOA5LR Newcomer Casual Costume - Nyotengu
- DOA5LR Newcomer Bedtime Costume - Nyotengu
- DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Honoka
- DOA5LR Newcomer Police Costume - Honoka
- DOA5LR Newcomer Bedtime Costume - Honoka
- DOA5LR Newcomer Casual Costume - Honoka
- DOA5LR Newcomer School Costume - Naotora Ii
- DOA5LR Newcomer Police Costume - Naotora Ii
- DOA5LR Newcomer Gym Class Costume - Naotora Ii
- DOA5LR Newcomer Swimsuit Costume - Naotora Ii

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You must purchase the character Naotora Ii separately before using content for her.
short_description: The new fighters get some new costumes! This set contains a total of 16 costumes for 5 characters. Content included: - Marie Rose: 3 costumes - Phase 4: 2 costumes - Nyotengu: 3 costumes - Honoka: 4 costumes - Naotora Ii: 4 costumes *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
